p: Raw reads were downloaded at BioProject IDs, PRJNA327296 for leaves [ 47], PRJNA297453 and SRR1725543 for stems [ 42, 44], and PRJNA243306 for roots [ 48] from the SRA database at NCBI. De novo transcriptome assembly was conducted using Trinity [ 72]. Finally, a single set of non-redundant unigenes were generated from all the unigenes using TGICL [ 73]. The TPS N-terminal domain (PF01397), TPS family metal binding domain (PF03936), prenyltransferase and squalene oxidase repeat (PF00432), and prenyltransferase like (PF13243) were downloaded from the Pfam database ( http://pfam.xfam.org/), and used as bait to search against the S. album transcriptome with an E-value threshold of 10 − 5.
